author: Jasmine Henry
title: Sony’s $100 Million Pandemic Donation is a Gaming Industry Wake-up Call
description: Sony announces a $100 million COVID-19 relief fund, showing just how little money many other gaming companies are donating. The post Sony’s $100 Million Pandemic Donation is a Gaming Industry Wake-up Call appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Sony announces a $100 million global relief fund to help fight the COVID-19 pandemic.
  • First, $10 million is being given to the World Health Organizations pandemic fighting force.
  • In comparison, other gaming companies have offered just … [+2078 chars]
